summary: The implementation successfully adds a comprehensive care activity logging system with backend storage, frontend components, and timeline integration. All 11 requirements (REQ-16 through REQ-26) are implemented with proper data types, CRUD operations, UI components, and cache invalidation following existing patterns.

hallucinated_features.description: Migration module added (backend/migration.mo) that handles data migration from old types to new types including CareActivity
hallucinated_features.reason: No requirement requested a migration system. The BuildRequest only asked for adding the care activity system to the existing architecture, not migrating existing data structures.

hallucinated_features.description: Deletion confirmation dialog warns about deletion of 'care activities' specifically
hallucinated_features.reason: While REQ-20 requires cascade deletion of care activities when deleting a horse, no requirement specified updating the user-facing deletion confirmation message to mention care activities.
